title: FoLA2-Based Learning Activity Design for Strengthening Scientific Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizes science-based problem-solving skills applicable to workplace tasks, with a collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activities integrating learning analytics tools using the FoLA2 methodology
Learners develop science experiment projects incorporating peer feedback in blended environments
Learners can interpret learning analytics data to propose activity design improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
